# Introduction

BrainBuilder is a tool to define the cells that will compose a circuit.
It also houses utilities for working with SONATA circuits.

# Installation

```shell
    $ pip install brainbuilder
```

# Contribution Guidelines
See CONTRIBUTING.md.
